reviewText: Well this version is the special edition that comes with post cards and the dvd and blu ray edition, but it does not have subtitles sadly so order only if you understand Japanese

In case any other Americans were considering purchasing this one, rest assured, it plays on my Blu-ray just fine :) As far as the content's concerned, it does differ significantly enough from the regular R2 dvds to make it worth having this version, if you're as big a fan as I am!
